taskDescription:
The average price of a gallon of regular gasoline in the California on July 1, 2021 was <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mo>$</mo>
  </mrow>
  <mn>4.28</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">$4.28</annotation></semantics></math> per gallon. Albert stops at a gas station in California and puts 9.5 gallons of gasoline into his Civic. How much did he pay for the gas?
